caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

data.message:
On Windows this is very easy to do with hMailServer https://www.hmailserver.com/ - you'll still need a mail client though.
That, and many hosting providers will give you license for SmarterMail, an in-premise email server and client (so no cloud or giving away your secrets).

This is a related blog post writteb by Bill Zimmerman, the CEO of VC4Africa :

http://www.27months.com/2013/10/its-always-sunny-in-iceland-or-how-i-nsa-proofed-my-email/
I always wanted to do this, but after I read this blog series a while ago, I decided that it's tougher than it looks. Spam seems to be a big concern.
